ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user

Class FriendsListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user.FriendsListFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View$OnCreateContextMenuListener, Observer

    public class FriendsListFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements Observer
    Fragment that displays the User's FriendsList in a ListView.

    The User can also add Friends here, by pressing the FloatingActionButton.

      • createAddFriendDialog

        private AlertDialog createAddFriendDialog()
        Creates a new AlertDialog which can be used to add friends.

        The alertDialog contains a single EditText where the user can enter the username to be added.

        Returns:
        the configured AlertDialog
